extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed version of Ivanti Connect Secure, Policy Secure, or ZTA.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-22024?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Available Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patches available for the affected versions as soon as possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Update as Part of Remediation
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the update as part of the remediation actions if immediate actions have not been performed.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Mitigation File
extracted_playbook.description: Import the mitigation file 'importing mitigation.release.20240126.5.xml' to block the vulnerability CVE-2024-22024.

extracted_playbook.title: Take Affected Products Offline
extracted_playbook.description: Take the affected Ivanti products offline until patching or mitigation can be implemented.

extracted_playbook.title: Acquire Forensic Evidence
extracted_playbook.description: Acquire forensic evidence (disk image and memory) to perform a compromise assessment.

extracted_playbook.title: Run External Integrity Checker Tool (ICT)
extracted_playbook.description: Run the external Integrity Checker Tool (ICT) to scan the current state of the appliance. Ensure forensic evidence is taken before running it.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Compromise Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform a compromise assessment by contacting Ivanti support to create a forensic image of the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Reset Local Users' Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Reset local users' passwords, including those of service accounts used for auth server configuration.

extracted_playbook.title: Revoke and Replace Private Certificates
extracted_playbook.description: Revoke and replace any private certificate that was installed on the ICS.

extracted_playbook.title: Hunt for Suspicious Events
extracted_playbook.description: Hunt for suspicious events during the past weeks, such as suspicious authentication and recently created privileged users.
